## Bubble.setDeleteStyle() method

Update the style of this bubble when it is dragged over a delete area.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setDeleteStyle(_enable: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_enable | boolean | True if the bubble is about to be deleted, false otherwise. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
